dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1596 IH: To designate the U.S. National Poultry Research Center of the Department of Agriculture located in Athens, Georgia, as the “Abit Massey Poultry Research Center”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Georgia (for himself, Mr. Bishop, Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Mr. Allen, Mrs. McBath, Mr. Clyde, Ms. Williams of Georgia, Ms. Greene of Georgia, Mr. McCormick, Mr. Collins, and Mr. Jack) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To designate the U.S. National Poultry Research Center of the Department of Agriculture located in Athens, Georgia, as the Abit Massey Poultry Research Center.

subsection.text: The U.S. National Poultry Research Center of the Department of Agriculture located in Athens, Georgia, shall be known and designated as the Abit Massey Poultry Research Center.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Abit Massey Poultry Research Center.
